thread.title: NOPD: 4 women injured following Lower Ninth Ward shooting
thread.title_full: NOPD: 4 women injured following Lower Ninth Ward shooting - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: NOPD: 4 women injured following Lower Ninth Ward shooting
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - New Orleans police are investigating a shooting in the Lower Ninth Ward that left four women injured. The incident occurred Sunday around 9 p.m. near the intersection of Choctaw Street and Florida Avenue.
Police say that the four women were brought to a local hospitals. Their injuries are non-life threatening.
Officers initially said three women were injured in the shooting. The fourth victim arrived at a hospital later.
The women were standing on a basketball court when shots were fired, according to the NOPD.
If you have any information that could help police with this case, you are asked to call Crimestoppers at 504-822-1111.
